name: GoMacro Banana + Almond Butter Bar
description:
Packed with 11g of plant-based protein, GoMacro’s Banana + Almond Butter bar is a delicious way to speed up your recovery.Organic ingredients:  brown rice syrup, almond butter, protein blend (sprouted brown rice protein, pea protein), puffed brown rice, bananas, sunflower seeds, walnuts, coconut sugar, cinnamon and natural flavor.Manufactured in a facility that processes peanuts and other nuts.May contain pit or nutshell fragments.

        Sustainability
